CSettingsStorageMSXML Class Reference

#include <MSettingsStorageMSXML.h>

Inheritance diagram for CSettingsStorageMSXML:

Detailed Description

CSettingsStorage implementation for XML using MSXML.

This class can't be used alone, it's a base class that handles DOMDocument. Use subclasses to actually use a persistant XML storage.
